vv33:11.1: Anantaraṁ caturavimānaṁ yathā vatthadāyikāvimānaṁ tathā vitthāretabbaṁ → yathā ca tattha evaṁ upari sabbavimānesu vitthāretabbaṁ (bj); Anantaraṁ → itaraṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed)
vv33:46.1: (Anantaraṁ caturavimānaṁ yathā gandhapañcaṅgulikadāyikāvimānaṁ tathā vitthāretabbaṁ.) → etthantare pāṭho bj potthake
vv33:59.3: Anusūyikā → anussūyikā (bj, pts-vp-pli2); anussuyyikā (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1) | upaṭṭhāsiṁ → sūpaṭṭhāsiṁ (bj)
vv33:64.3: Akkodhanānatimāninī → akkodhanā anatimānī (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli2); anatimāni (pts-vp-pli1)
vv33:73.1: Anantaraṁ pañcavīsativimānaṁ yathā khīrodanadāyikāvimānaṁ tathā vitthāretabbaṁ → etthantare pāṭho si potthake
vv33:91.1: Aṁsabaddhakaṁ → aṁsavaṭṭakaṁ (bj, pts-vp-pli1-2); aṁsabandhakaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed); aṁsabandhanaṁ (mr)
vv33:103.3: addasāmi → addasaṁ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1-2); addasāsiṁ (pts-vp-pli-a)
vv33:104.1: Imāsāhaṁ → imāhaṁ (bj); tāsāhaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr) | sutvā → sutvāna (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
